articles.title: Intermittent fasting tied to a higher risk of cardiovascular death, research shows - The Hill
articles.description: Intermittent fasting — a diet that cycles between voluntary fasting and non-fasting periods — could be linked to a higher risk of dying from cardiovascular disease, according to a new analysis. The analysis, first presented Monday at the American Heart Associ…
